section.name: stx_fsw_module_eventlist_to_archive_buffer
section.description: This module constructs archive buffer entries using calibrated detector event list data.

section.name: stx_fsw_module_rate_control_regime
section.description: Calculates the rate control regime states.

parameter.name: execution_frequency
parameter.description: Update frequency of this module in 4 seconds base interval

parameter.name: l0
parameter.description: Upper live time accumulator threshold for changing from C1 to C0, i.e. RCR1 to RCR0 (viz, for removing attenuator).

parameter.name: l1
parameter.description: Lower live time accumulator threshold for changing from C0 to C1, i.e. RCR0 to RCR1 (viz, for inserting the attenuator.

parameter.name: l2
parameter.description: Lower live tme acculator threshold for change RCR by reducing the effective detector area.

parameter.name: l3
parameter.description: Upper live time accumulator threshold for changing RCR by increasing the effective detector area.

parameter.name: r0
parameter.description: Upper limit on Rb (from background detector) for removing attenuator (max counts in 4s in 1 BKGD pixel for RCR1 to RCR0)

parameter.name: j0
parameter.description: Upper threshold to background detector counts for disabling additional background pixels.

parameter.name: j1
parameter.description: Lower threshold to background detector counts for enabling additional background pixels.
